T02TD2527E:175a-1: sa manta bha dra n'a ma ho ma lo bi ka /
T02TD2527E:175b-0: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin @175b sreg gi cho ga //
T02TD2527E:175b-1: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2527E:175b-2: byang chub sems brtan las byung ba //
T02TD2527E:175b-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2527E:175b-4: dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa //
T02TD2527E:175b-5: sbyin sreg de nyid bdag gis bshad //
T02TD2527E:175b-6: de nyid rigs pas sbyin sreg la //
T02TD2527E:175b-7: dgos pa dang po kun byas te //
T02TD2527E:175b-8: grogs bzang bya ba nges pa dang //
T02TD2527E:175b-9: phyi nas sbyin sreg rab tu bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-10: gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang //
T02TD2527E:175b-11: kun dga' grong ngam grong khyer ni //
T02TD2527E:175b-12: shar dang byang du blta ba ste //
T02TD2527E:175b-13: lho dang nub tu ma yin no //
T02TD2527E:175b-14: shis shing sngon ni ston pa yi //
T02TD2527E:175b-15: sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-16: yang na yid ni dga' 'gyur ba //
T02TD2527E:175b-17: gang yin der ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-18: dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas su //
T02TD2527E:175b-19: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bya ste //
T02TD2527E:175b-20: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2527E:175b-21: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la //
T02TD2527E:175b-22: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD2527E:175b-23: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2527E:175b-24: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2527E:175b-25: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2527E:175b-26: rdo rje rin chen sbras par ni //
T02TD2527E:175b-27: dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo //
T02TD2527E:175b-28: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02TD2527E:175b-29: sbyin sreg thab ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-30: kun nas zur ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD2527E:175b-31: khru gnyes bar ni yongs su bsgrags //
T02TD2527E:175b-32: zabs su khru gang tsam la ni //
T02TD2527E:175b-33: kha khyer bzhi ni bskor ba'i //
T02TD2527E:175b-34: dbus su gtsug tor dgod bya zhing //
T02TD2527E:175b-35: de yi shar du lhung bzed do //
T02TD2527E:175b-36: lho phyogs na ni rin chen te //
T02TD2527E:175b-37: nub kyi phyogs su padma bri //
T02TD2527E:175b-38: byang du rdo rje h'um mdzad ni //
T02TD2527E:175b-39: gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'o //
T02TD2527E:175b-40: mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du //
T02TD2527E:175b-41: gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa dgod //
T02TD2527E:175b-42: de ltar thab khung nges byas nas //
T02TD2527E:175b-43: kha khyer la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-44: dang po la ni sems dpa' che //
T02TD2527E:175b-45: bcu drug nyid du bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2527E:175b-46: de yi rgyar ni sor brgyad la//
T02TD2527E:175b-47: dpangs su sor ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2527E:175b-48: kha khyer gnyis par gyur pa dag / de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad de //
T02TD2527E:175b-49: dpangs su sor ni brgyad par bshad //
T02TD2527E:175b-50: de dgongs bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD2527E:175b-51: shar phyogs nas brtsams rim bzhin du //
T02TD2527E:175b-52: padma nags kyi mjug ma dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-2: aa dze na yi phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2527E:176a-3: tri sh'u la dang zla ba phyed //
T02TD2527E:176a-4: ral pa mig dang rgyal mtshan che //
T02TD2527E:176a-5: mdzes shing bde ba'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD2527E:176a-6: lho yi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2527E:176a-7: dung dang 'khor lo be con dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-8: ral gri dang ni de bzhin phub //
T02TD2527E:176a-9: phag dang seng ge gshibs pa ni //
T02TD2527E:176a-10: nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya //
T02TD2527E:176a-11: mdung dang dril bu ba dan dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-12: rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-13: khyim bya lang chos myos pa ni //
T02TD2527E:176a-14: byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya //
T02TD2527E:176a-15: kha khyer gsum par gyur ba dag / de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad pa //
T02TD2527E:176a-16: dpangs su sor ni bcu drug pa ;
T02TD2527E:176a-17: / sgo glegs dang ni gtan par bcas //
T02TD2527E:176a-18: de yi phyogs bzhir rta babs dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-19: bcas pa'i sgo rnams bya ba dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-20: dra ba dra phyed me long bcas //
T02TD2527E:176a-21: ba dan la sogs rnams kyis bskor //
T02TD2527E:176a-22: kha khyer bzhi par bshad pa ni //
T02TD2527E:176a-23: khor yug lta bur yang dag gnas //
T02TD2527E:176a-24: rgya ru sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD2527E:176a-25: dbangs su sor ni drug pa'o //
T02TD2527E:176a-26: de yang rdo rje phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2527E:176a-28: 'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog yin zhes //
T02TD2527E:176a-29: rdo rje can gyis sngon gsungs so //
T02TD2527E:176a-30: sdig kun 'phrog cing bsod nams dang //
T02TD2527E:176a-31: dag byed dngos grub thams cad ster //
T02TD2527E:176a-32: bkra shis pa nyid yin bshad pa //
T02TD2527E:176a-33: 'di ni thab khung yin par bsgrags //
T02TD2527E:176a-34: gang yang brgya rtsa bcu pa yis //
T02TD2527E:176a-35: thab khung bzang po bshad pa rnams //
T02TD2527E:176a-36: spyi yi thab khung gang yin pa //
T02TD2527E:176a-37: bye brag can bzhin gnas pa yin //
T02TD2527E:176a-38: thab khung gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2527E:176a-39: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:176a-40: dgang gzar gyi yu ba ni rgyal po'i lag pa'i tshad kyis sor bcu drug kun nas sor bzhi pa /
T02TD2527E:176a-41: dgang gzar gyi zabs su sor gnyis pa /
T02TD2527E:176a-43: dbus su rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan pa //
T02TD2527E:176a-44: yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2527E:176a-45: blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni khru gang tsam la steng du padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba sor gnyis pa la /
T02TD2527E:176a-46: dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2527E:176a-47: khrus dang nye reg la 'bad nas /
T02TD2527E:176b-0: rtag tu sbyin sreg khang par @176b 'jug / de nas bgegs rnams nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02TD2527E:176b-1: khro bo'i rgyal po rjes dran bya //
T02TD2527E:176b-2: de la khro bo'i rgyal po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:176b-3: khro bo ti r'int'i ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:176b-4: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2527E:176b-5: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:176b-6: rdo rje bcing ba nang du bcings la /
T02TD2527E:176b-7: mthe bong gnyis po mnyam pas /
T02TD2527E:176b-8: sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad btsir bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-9: 'dis ni bdud la sogs pa bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:176b-10: de nas go cha 'dis phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-12: rdo rje zhags pas shar phyogs bcing ngo //
T02TD2527E:176b-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02TD2527E:176b-14: mthe'u chud gcig la gcig sbrel te /
T02TD2527E:176b-15: mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar nas rtse mo bzlog ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-16: spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-17: sngags la aom h'um bandha h'um /
T02TD2527E:176b-19: rdo rje gtsug tor nyid zlum por byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste sngags la hr'i:badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2527E:176b-20: de nas rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-21: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya /
T02TD2527E:176b-22: mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pa 'di ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya ste sngags la aom badzra pa tangki pa tangki ni ra ta /
T02TD2527E:176b-23: de nas rdo rje nag pos byang dang 'og dang steng dang mtshams rnams bcings te /
T02TD2527E:176b-24: rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba bcings la mthe bo brkyang ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-25: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje nag po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-26: sngags la hr'i:badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2527E:176b-27: de nas rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcings te /
T02TD2527E:176b-28: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2527E:176b-29: rtse mo ltar steng du gzhag pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-30: sngags la aom badzra shi sha re ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2527E:176b-31: de nas rdo rje spyan gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bas bgegs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:176b-32: rdo rje bsdams pa byas la /
T02TD2527E:176b-33: mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam por gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2527E:176b-34: rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2527E:176b-35: sngags la aom badzra nee tri bandha sarbba bighd'am rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang pa ni rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-1: spyi bo nas brtsams te bdag nyid dbang bskur ba byas la dar dbyangs pa'i tshul du bkrol nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:177a-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2527E:177a-3: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar gzhag / rdo rje khu tshur g-yas pa bsor ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bas bdud la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad bsregs pa dang 'tshed pa dang thal bar byed pa la sogs pa la khyab par byas te /
T02TD2527E:177a-5: sngags la aom badzra dzv'a la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02TD2527E:177a-6: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:177a-7: g-yas nas bskor bas phyogs bcings shing /
T02TD2527E:177a-8: dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi steng du rdo rje rab byas na dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:177a-9: de nas sa gzhi bcings bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-10: rdo rje bsdams pa kha thur du bstan te sa la bzhag nas sa'i gzhi rnams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
T02TD2527E:177a-11: rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:177a-12: sngags ni aom badzra dri dho me bh'a ba ra kasha sarbbam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:177a-13: zhes pa 'dis sa bcings bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:177a-14: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' bcings bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-15: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya nyid do //
T02TD2527E:177a-16: sngags ni aom badzra yaksha h'um /
T02TD2527E:177a-17: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mig gi phyag rgyas steng bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me bskor ba'i tshul du bskor te mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:177a-19: sngags ni aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2527E:177a-20: de nas rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i dra ba bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-21: rdo rje bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:177a-23: de nas dogs pa med par gyur par byas nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177a-24: rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o //
T02TD2527E:177a-25: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa satha n'a ya /
T02TD2527E:177a-26: a'atma n'am nir+ya ta y'a mi /
T02TD2527E:177a-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2527E:177b-0: de nas de bzhin du gnas la rdo rje thal mo snying gar gzhag @177b ste dpral bas phyag bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she k'a ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD2527E:177b-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2527E:177b-3: de nas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag la khas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2527E:177b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brtan ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02TD2527E:177b-5: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma pra barta ya m'am ;
T02TD2527E:177b-6: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-7: snying gar bzhag nas mgos phyag bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karmma ni a'atma n'am nirya ta y'a mi /
T02TD2527E:177b-9: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra karmma ku ru m'am /
T02TD2527E:177b-10: des ni mchod pa bye ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:177b-11: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la ;
T02TD2527E:177b-12: pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T02TD2527E:177b-13: spyi bo sa la gtugs pa ni phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-14: sngags ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta p'a da bandha nam ka ro mi zhes bya'o //
T02TD2527E:177b-15: bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:177b-16: lha'i bdug pa'i mchod pa rnams dran bzhin du sngags 'di brjod do //
T02TD2527E:177b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-18: de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:177b-19: thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog gi sprin rnams spros te /
T02TD2527E:177b-20: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-21: de nas mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:177b-22: nyi ma'i snang ba dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-23: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-24: byug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:177b-25: lha la sogs pa'i spos kyi sprin rnams dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:177b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-27: de nas rin po che'i bye brag la sogs pa rnams dbul te /
T02TD2527E:177b-28: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta po dhyam ga ratn'a lam k'a ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-29: de nas rtsed mo'i bde ba thams cad dbul te /
T02TD2527E:177b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta h'a sya l'a sya kri da ra ti soo khya aa nutta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-31: de nas gos kyi mchod pa rnams dbul te /
T02TD2527E:177b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhy'a lam ka ra bstra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:177b-33: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2527E:177b-34: sems can thams cad kyi tshangs pa chen po'i gnas bzhi thob par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsa tur ma h'a @178a * //
T02TD2527E:178a-1: brahma bi ha ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-2: de nas rdo rje bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2527E:178a-3: sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod nas de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-4: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta bo dhi tsitta p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-5: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzrod bha b'a d'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-7: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178a-8: sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a bo dha dya har sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza ma gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-10: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178a-11: sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-12: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dharmma aa ba bo dhi kashan ti p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-13: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178a-14: sems can thams cad 'khor ba yangs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta san s'a r'a p'a ri tyam ka b'i rya p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-16: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178a-17: sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan zhing sems zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2527E:178a-18: bdag gis bsam gtan sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul te /
T02TD2527E:178a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta soo khya bi h'a ra dya na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178a-20: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje me tog ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178a-21: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba rtogs par khong du chud pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2527E:178a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir de dran par bya ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-0: @178b aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kle shatstshe da sa manta pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:178b-2: bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par bsams la btud par bya ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya ni rya ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i lce bsams la bstod pas mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka pra brtan p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178b-6: bsod nams de rnams bsdus la sems can thams cad la nye bar bsngo bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-7: aom sarbba tha th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2527E:178b-8: mchod pa nyi shu rdzogs so //
T02TD2527E:178b-9: de ltar mchod pa byas nas dam tshig dang sdom pa blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2527E:178b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02TD2527E:178b-12: byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD2527E:178b-13: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2527E:178b-14: byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i //
T02TD2527E:178b-15: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2527E:178b-16: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi ;
T02TD2527E:178b-17: / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2527E:178b-18: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang /
T02TD2527E:178b-19: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2527E:178b-20: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2527E:178b-21: de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:178b-22: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2527E:178b-23: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2527E:178b-24: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:178b-25: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02TD2527E:178b-26: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2527E:178b-27: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2527E:178b-28: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:178b-29: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:178b-30: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2527E:178b-31: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2527E:178b-32: nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu //
T02TD2527E:178b-33: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02TD2527E:178b-34: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02TD2527E:178b-35: padma'i rigs mchog dam pa la //
T02TD2527E:178b-36: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2527E:178b-37: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-2: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02TD2527E:179a-3: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-4: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-5: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2527E:179a-6: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas ni //
T02TD2527E:179a-7: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2527E:179a-8: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2527E:179a-9: ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-10: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-11: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2527E:179a-12: sems can mya ngan 'das gzhag bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-14: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2527E:179a-15: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni ;
T02TD2527E:179a-16: / cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD2527E:179a-17: spho ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-18: de la dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:179a-19: zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi //
T02TD2527E:179a-20: gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi //
T02TD2527E:179a-21: mthe bo mthe'u chung so sor bsgreng //
T02TD2527E:179a-22: sems dpa'i rdo rje rdo rje bsgreng //
T02TD2527E:179a-23: shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:179a-26: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje zhags pas bskul bar bya ste /
T02TD2527E:179a-28: nub phyogs kyi sgro rdo rje lcags sgrog rjes su dran par bya ste /
T02TD2527E:179a-30: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dril bu brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2527E:179a-32: rdo rje 'bebs pa rjes su dran pas bskor ba lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179a-33: aom badzra be g'a ku ma h'um /
T02TD2527E:179a-34: rdo rje sems ma'i snying po ni /
T02TD2527E:179a-35: sa ma ya satvam aom sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2527E:179a-36: snying po 'dis sbyin sreg gi khang par rtag tu 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179a-37: aom sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi h'um /
T02TD2527E:179a-38: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha sva ba aa /
T02TD2527E:179a-40: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba sbyar ba byas la ye shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179a-41: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas na bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:179a-42: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa yang ci 'dod par bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179a-44: phyag rgya de snying gar bcings nas /
T02TD2527E:179a-46: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2527E:179a-47: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2527E:179a-48: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2527E:179a-49: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2527E:179a-50: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2527E:179a-51: hri da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme pra yatsatsha /
T02TD2527E:179b-0: @179b sarba karmma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:/
T02TD2527E:179b-1: da nas phreng ba de thab khung du snying po 'dis dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-2: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:de nas phreng ba de rang gi mgo la snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-3: pra t'i grihna sv'a mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02TD2527E:179b-4: de nas snying po 'dis rang gi gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-5: aom badzra satva sva yam te dhya /
T02TD2527E:179b-6: tsakshu audgha ta na ta dha ba ra /
T02TD2527E:179b-7: audgha ta ya te sarbba kosha badzra tsakshur aa nutta ra ma he badzra p'a shya de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i spos chu dang /
T02TD2527E:179b-8: snying po 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-10: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-11: de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:179b-12: mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol nas ni //
T02TD2527E:179b-13: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02TD2527E:179b-14: gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02TD2527E:179b-15: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02TD2527E:179b-16: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2527E:179b-17: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
T02TD2527E:179b-18: padmo srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
T02TD2527E:179b-19: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2527E:179b-20: de la de rnams kyi rig pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:179b-21: aom badzra dh'a ti shva ri h'um /
T02TD2527E:179b-26: de nas rang gi rdo rje lag tu bzhag nas /
T02TD2527E:179b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2527E:179b-29: de ring khyod ni bskur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2527E:179b-30: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2527E:179b-31: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2527E:179b-32: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam /
T02TD2527E:179b-33: aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya satvam /
T02TD2527E:179b-34: de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2527E:179b-35: aom badzra satva tvam ma h'a aa bhi shinytsa m'am badzra na ma aa bhi she ka ta he badzra n'a ma /
T02TD2527E:179b-36: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:179b-37: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2527E:179b-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2527E:179b-39: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2527E:179b-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi /
T02TD2527E:179b-41: badzra satva hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2527E:179b-42: bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs //
T02TD2527E:180a-1: lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02TD2527E:180a-2: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02TD2527E:180a-3: de nas rdo rje bsgrub par bgyi //
T02TD2527E:180a-4: zhes gang gsungs pa de slar yang bshad pa de dag yin no //
T02TD2527E:180a-5: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2527E:180a-6: rdo rje lcags rgyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2527E:180a-7: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02TD2527E:180a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02TD2527E:180a-10: snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na /
T02TD2527E:180a-11: des sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2527E:180a-12: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur na /
T02TD2527E:180a-13: gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD2527E:180a-14: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2527E:180a-15: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2527E:180a-16: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2527E:180a-17: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2527E:180a-18: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2527E:180a-19: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02TD2527E:180a-20: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yin //
T02TD2527E:180a-21: dam tshig rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2527E:180a-22: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2527E:180a-23: sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD2527E:180a-24: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02TD2527E:180a-27: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02TD2527E:180a-28: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar //
T02TD2527E:180a-29: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug / bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD2527E:180a-30: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02TD2527E:180a-31: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
T02TD2527E:180a-32: thams cad don kun 'grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2527E:180a-33: thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba bgyi //
T02TD2527E:180a-34: de nas sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad rdo rje'i rtse mo'i sngags kyis bsangs la g-yas phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD2527E:180a-35: mchod yon gyi snod ni g-yon du bzhag nas /
T02TD2527E:180a-36: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang sngags ni 'dis dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02TD2527E:180a-38: pra d'ipta a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a sa ma ya badzra h'um dza:de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2527E:180a-39: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thab kyi dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02TD2527E:180a-40: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2527E:180b-0: til gyi sreg blugs @180b dbul lo //
T02TD2527E:180b-1: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02TD2527E:180b-2: rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02TD2527E:180b-3: mnyam par gzhag par snyoms zhugs par //
T02TD2527E:180b-4: til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing //
T02TD2527E:180b-6: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:180b-7: khyim rgyas par 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la /
T02TD2527E:180b-8: mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02TD2527E:180b-9: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2527E:180b-10: me ni rab tu spar nas kyang //
T02TD2527E:180b-11: rtag tu 'bras ni sreg byas na //
T02TD2527E:180b-12: gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD2527E:180b-14: aom badzra pusht'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:180b-15: de nas te ring bar 'dod pas /
T02TD2527E:180b-16: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa thab kyi dbus su bsams la /
T02TD2527E:180b-17: mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02TD2527E:180b-18: yam shing dmar po rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD2527E:180b-19: mkhas pas rtag tu me sbar te ;
T02TD2527E:180b-20: d'ur ba'i myu gu mar bcas pas //
T02TD2527E:180b-23: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:180b-24: de nas bdag gam gzhan rnams bsrung bar 'dod pas /
T02TD2527E:180b-25: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la /
T02TD2527E:180b-26: til mar gyi dgangs blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02TD2527E:180b-27: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2527E:180b-28: me ni rab tu spar byas la //
T02TD2527E:180b-29: ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis //
T02TD2527E:180b-30: sbyin sreg byas na nges par bsrung /
T02TD2527E:180b-32: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:180b-33: de nas rang gi lha thab kyi dbus su bsams la til dang 'bras dang mar dang d'ur ba dang til mar dang /
T02TD2527E:180b-34: ku sha'i myu gu la sogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2527E:180b-35: dgang blugs dang po dang rdzogs khar dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:180b-36: zhi ba phal cher srod la bya'o //
T02TD2527E:180b-37: rgyas pa snga dro bya ba yin //
T02TD2527E:180b-38: mngon spyod nyi ma gung la ste /
T02TD2527E:180b-39: sgrub pa pos ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2527E:180b-40: zhi la kha dog dkar po ste //
T02TD2527E:180b-41: rgyas la ser por snang ba yin //
T02TD2527E:180b-42: rjes su chags la kha dog dmar //
T02TD2527E:180b-43: mngon spyod la ni sngo dang gnag / de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te /
T02TD2527E:180b-44: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dgu dang //
T02TD2527E:181a-3: las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcang //
T02TD2527E:181a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2527E:181a-5: d'ur ba dang dri'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te de rnam par mthong nas /
T02TD2527E:181a-6: dgang blugs phul la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-7: sbyin sreg gi lha rnams tshim par byas nas bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2527E:181a-8: de bas na nus pa med pas kyang ci nus pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-9: nus pa med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2527E:181a-10: rang gi khang pa'i byang shar gyi phyogs su thab khung zur bzhi'am /
T02TD2527E:181a-11: zlum por khru gang tsam la zabs su mtho gang tsam brkos te thab kyi dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad la dpangs su sor bzhi pa bzhag thab kyi ngos la dpangs su sor bzhi pa'i grva bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-12: de la phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:181a-13: thal mo dam du sbyar ba las //
T02TD2527E:181a-14: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02TD2527E:181a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2527E:181a-16: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-17: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rim pa rnams nye bar bstan te /
T02TD2527E:181a-18: rdo rje bcing bas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo /
T02TD2527E:181a-19: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas /
T02TD2527E:181a-20: rab tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2527E:181a-22: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings la rang la byin gyis brlab pa nas ji srid rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i bye brag rnams rang gi lus dang ngag yid rdo rje la dgug pa dang /
T02TD2527E:181a-26: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-27: aa rdo rje khu tshur gyis mdzub mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:181a-28: de nas zhugs nas rang la byin gyis brlab pa nas ji srid sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mdza' bo nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:181a-29: de nas dam tshig chen bo'i sems dpa' rjes su dran la /
T02TD2527E:181a-31: sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02TD2527E:181b-0: 'dis ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i @181b phyag rgyas dam tshig chen bo'i sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:181b-1: phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-2: de nas thun mong gi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:181b-3: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa' chen po de nyid rang gi lus la brten cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bzhugs shing /
T02TD2527E:181b-4: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i sku bdag nyid du snying bo 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-6: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la sngags 'dis der byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-7: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2527E:181b-8: de nas rang gi lha snga ma bzhin du thab kyi dbus su bsams la sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste /
T02TD2527E:181b-9: mchod nas snying bo 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2527E:181b-10: badzra mu:de nas rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur la mdzub mo gnyis kyi phreng ba bcings shing de bzhin du snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-11: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa sarbba mu dra mee tri dhi ku ru ba ra ka pa tse na bam /
T02TD2527E:181b-12: rin chen sems ma'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:181b-13: rin chen rdo rje las mthe bo mnyam ste mdzub mo bkug pa dang rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-14: de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba de bkrol la snying po 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-16: go cha 'dis phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
T02TD2527E:181b-17: dbang bskur ba bcing zhing mnyes par bya ba'am /
T02TD2527E:181b-18: rdo rje sems dpas kyang rdo rje nyid du nye bar dgrol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2527E:181b-19: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod la /
T02TD2527E:181b-20: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2527E:181b-21: rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2527E:181b-22: bsam pa g-yos pas gdung bar bya //
T02TD2527E:181b-23: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas byung //
T02TD2527E:181b-24: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02TD2527E:181b-25: rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2527E:181b-26: spos la sogs pa de bzhin dbul //
T02TD2527E:181b-27: thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor //
T02TD2527E:181b-28: bskor dang de bzhin byug pa'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-0: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ni 'di @182a * //
T02TD2527E:182a-2: aom badzra satva su sam gra ham /
T02TD2527E:182a-6: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di dang glu blangs la /
T02TD2527E:182a-7: lag ba'i rtse mos gar byas nas //
T02TD2527E:182a-9: rab dang 'bad pas khrus byas te //
T02TD2527E:182a-10: rtag tu sbyin sreg khang bar zhugs //
T02TD2527E:182a-11: zhes ji skad du bshad pa de ma smras so zhe na /
T02TD2527E:182a-13: rnam rtog khrus kyi sbyor ba 'di //
T02TD2527E:182a-14: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bshad pa //
T02TD2527E:182a-15: de ni rnam rtog tsam yin pas //
T02TD2527E:182a-16: de la blo ni 'jug mi bya //
T02TD2527E:182a-17: de bas sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2527E:182a-18: legs byas khrus ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2527E:182a-19: rnam rtog la ni spyod bzhin du //
T02TD2527E:182a-20: gang gi bgegs ni mi 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2527E:182a-22: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2527E:182a-24: aom ku pi ku pi k'a ya ku pi pra dzva la ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:182a-26: dang po'i yi ge'i go chas go bgo ste rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2527E:182a-27: snying gar mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud pa byas la rgyab tu drangs te mdud pa bya slar yang snying gar drangs te mdud pa bya /
T02TD2527E:182a-28: de bzhin du lkog ma'i steng du mdud pa bya ba dang /
T02TD2527E:182a-29: dpral bar mdud pa bya ba dang ltag par mdud pa byas nas /
T02TD2527E:182a-30: rna ba gnyis kyi gong du mtha' nas dgrol bas dar dpyangs bya ste /
T02TD2527E:182a-31: mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-32: de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2527E:182a-33: aom tum rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdug pa thams cad bza' bar bya zhing /
T02TD2527E:182a-34: mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2527E:182a-36: h'um de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags brjod de /
T02TD2527E:182a-37: aa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-38: de nas gsang sngags 'dis chu snyim pa gsum gyen du gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-39: aom bhur dzva la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2527E:182a-40: rig sngags 'dis cha gsum du bya ste /
T02TD2527E:182a-41: gcig gis ni dge ba'i gtsang sbra bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-42: gnyis pas lus kyi gtsang sbra bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182a-43: gsum pas ni khrus dang nye reg bya zhing /
T02TD2527E:182b-0: rang gi mgor rang gi gsang sngags dang phyag @182b rgyas chu gtor na /
T02TD2527E:182b-1: rang gi rnam par rtog pa las skyes pa'i bgegs mi 'byung ste /
T02TD2527E:182b-2: sems can 'tshe ba'am sdig pa dag khyed la med kyi ma 'jigs shig / rig pa las byung dge ba bzhin //
T02TD2527E:182b-3: bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung //
T02TD2527E:182b-4: khrus byas nas ni sbyin sreg gi //
T02TD2527E:182b-5: cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182b-6: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2527E:182b-7: snying po 'dis gyen du dgrol lo //
T02TD2527E:182b-8: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02TD2527E:182b-9: dngos grub ji bzhin gsol lags kyis //
T02TD2527E:182b-10: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol /
T02TD2527E:182b-12: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po rjes su dran la /
T02TD2527E:182b-13: ci bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2527E:182b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i ming tsam zhig / lan cig yongs su gzung bas kyang //
T02TD2527E:182b-15: 'di ni bsrung ba dam pa ste //
T02TD2527E:182b-16: mi zad rtag pa'i dngos grub ster //
T02TD2527E:182b-17: mkhas pa ngang pa'i rgyal pos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02TD2527E:182b-18: /'dir ni sbyin sreg cho ga bris pas dge ba gang bsags pa /
T02TD2527E:182b-19: des ni srid gsum tsher ma 'byin cing zhi bzhi rtog ldan pa /
T02TD2527E:182b-20: rgyal ba lnga yi cod pan 'dzin dang 'gro ba rjes su mnyam par shog / kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so /
